details.old_behavior: Documented level as string with default "debug"; usage example uses level: "debug".
details.new_behavior: Code expects level of "info" | "warn" | "error" with default "info".
details.fix_summary: Updated README to list allowed level values and correct default; usage example now uses a valid level.

details.new_behavior: Code defaults json to true and logs JSON stringified output when enabled.
details.fix_summary: Updated README to reflect json default true and describe output formats.
